attributes.action: Stop Media Isis broadcasts and world wide broadcasts of their activity.Disempower them this way.
attributes.additional_details: Isis is showing itself to be a cult and is departing far away from the kindness of Islam and all other beliefs. Stop their power in providing free broadcasts of their activity by media world wide. They are feeding on this . They have shown no compassion, no boundaries and will kill regardless seeming to enjoy the media attention so switch it off.
